Yes, holy fire has the ability to defeat chaos creatures, as it is considered a powerful force of order and purity. The blue color of the fire suggests that it's a powerful force of light, capable of purging darkness and chaos. This makes Eris's seafire ability even more valuable, as it gives her the power to effectively combat the dangerous chaos creatures that threaten the empire. It could be used to seal the rifts that are allowing chaos creatures to enter the physical realm, and also to purify the corrupted resonants.

As a powerful resonant with unique abilities and a strong sense of duty, Eris could play an important role in defending the empire against the various threats it faces, both internal and external.
